iree_add_all_subdirs()

option(NL_USE_SERVER "Use NL execution server" OFF)

if(NL_USE_SERVER)
set(NL_API_CLIENT "nl_api_client.c")
else()
set(NL_API_CLIENT "nl_api.c")
endif()

    nonlocal
  HDRS
    "inline_command_buffer.h"
    "local_executable.h"
    "buffer.h"
    "allocator.h"
    "embedded_elf_loader.h"

    "buffer.c"
    "allocator.c"

    iree::hal::local::executable_library
    iree::base
    iree::base::internal
    iree::base::internal::cpu
    iree::base::internal::fpu_state
    iree::hal
  PUBLIC
)
